abstract: Merrill Lynch, battered by more than $40 billion of write-downs tied largely to mortgages, said on Tuesday it hired Michael Nierenberg from JPMorgan Chase to head its mortgage and securitization businesses.
lead_paragraph: Merrill Lynch, battered by more than $40 billion of write-downs tied largely to mortgages, said on Tuesday it hired Michael Nierenberg from JPMorgan Chase to head its mortgage and securitization businesses.

headline.main: Merrill Hires Head of Mortgages and Securitization
